conversation.greeting: Namaste! I am your Museum Booking Assistant. I can help you book tickets, check museum timings, or answer any questions you have.
conversation.nameAsk: To get started, may I know your name?
conversation.nameConfirm: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! How can I assist you today?
conversation.emailAsk: Can you share your email address for booking confirmation?
conversation.emailConfirm: Thank you! I will send the booking confirmation to {{email}}.
conversation.phoneAsk: May I take your phone number for important updates about your visit?
conversation.phoneConfirm: Perfect! I will send any important updates to {{phone}}.
conversation.museumSelect: Which museum would you like to visit? I can help you choose based on your interests.
conversation.dateAsk: When would you like to visit? I can show you available dates and peak times.
conversation.visitorAsk: How many visitors will be included? We have special pricing for children and seniors.
conversation.confirmBooking: Great! I have all the details. Would you like to proceed with the booking?
conversation.paymentPrompt: Please select your preferred payment method to complete the booking.
conversation.bookingSuccess: Great! Your booking is confirmed. I have sent the details to your email.
conversation.helpOffer: Would you like to know more about your visit?

errors.invalidName: I didn't understand that. Can you provide your full name?

errors.invalidPhone: I need a valid phone number to proceed. Please enter a number with the area code.
errors.bookingFailed: Sorry, but I couldn't complete the booking. Shall we try again?
